bibl.title: What's New in Demotic Studies? An Overview of the Publications 2010-2013.
bibl.note: Overview of recent publications in demotic studies, specifically new editions of demotic texts of the Graeco-Roman period. - Pp. 40-48: Appendix. List of publications of demotic texts and demotist studies since 2010. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.
